welcomeMsg:
Welcome to Cryptodog. Here are some helpful tips:
  • Cryptodog is not a magic bullet. You should never trust a piece of software with your life.
    • Cryptodog can't protect you against untrustworthy people or key loggers, and does not anonymize your connection.
roomHoverPopup: Enter a name for your conversation and share it with people you'd like to talk to, or join lobby to meet new people!
connectDialogUnderstatus: Enter the name of a conversation to join.
roomNameInvalidCharsError: Conversation name can be letters or numbers only.
nicknameInvalidCharsError: Nickname can be letters or numbers only.
sendFileInstructions: Only ZIP files and images are accepted. Maximum file size: (SIZE) MB.
invalidSentFileTypeError: Error: Please make sure your file is a ZIP file or an image.
invalidSentFileSizeError: Error: File cannot be larger than (SIZE) MB.
verifyIdentityInstruction: Verify this user's identity by asking a secret question. Answers must match exactly!
verifyIdentityRequestMessage: (NICKNAME) wants to verify your identity. Please answer the below secret question to authenticate yourself:
verifyIdentityRequestFailureMessage: Your answer must exactly match the one given by (NICKNAME).
unreadableMessageWarning: Warning: You have received an unreadable message from (NICKNAME). This may indicate an untrustworthy user or messages that failed to be received. You may also be running an outdated version of Cryptodog. Please check for updates.
outdatedClientWarning: Warning: Your version of Cryptodog is outdated. Updating to the latest version is strongly recommended! Do not proceed without updating to the latest version.
messageSendFailureWarning: Warning: this message could not be sent to (NICKNAME)
fingerprintChangedWarning: The authentication fingerprints for this contact have changed. This is not supposed to happen and could indicate suspicious behaviour. Please authenticate this contact before chatting with them.
